title: Inflows and Carry Will Revive EM Asian Bonds, Investors Say
description: Emerging Asia’s local-currency bonds are poised to rebound in 2026, according to Fidelity International and Bank of America Corp.
content: Emerging Asia’s local-currency bonds are poised to rebound in 2026, according to Fidelity International and Bank of America Corp.
